thread.title: Technical issues constantly being asked to "verify I am Human"
thread.title_full: Technical issues constantly being asked to "verify I am Human"

author: mrfrogdancewear
title: Technical issues constantly being asked to "verify I am Human"
text:
15-11-2024 1:17 PM
I have been an Ebay business seller for many years now, I regularly, most days am on my site processing orders, but in the last few weeks I am being constantly being asked to "Verify I am Human " , tick the pictures etc. This security measure is coming up on my site every few minutes whenever I try to open a new page, revise a listing.
Besides being very annoying, this is making me very wary that my site is being compromised or Hacked maybe.
I have the latest Chrome browser as recommended, plus 2 step verification to sign in, however this does not always work, & even when it does the above security measure still kicks in after a few minutes.
Has anyone else faced this problem and if so have you found any way to rectify it? I have contacted customer support who said they were looking into it, but it still persists.
Any help out there please???
15-11-2024 1:22 PM
Nope, you're not being hacked, we all come across this, identifying caravans and planes which all look the same.
It happens sproradically, and is purely a security measure to make sure the genuine owner is returning to their account.
After correctly identifying a few Giraffes and red buses, it should turn back to a single logging in with password.
@mrfrogdancewear
never-displayed
